response.overview: Dylan is an openly gay male and the captain of his college swim team. One day after practice, he bumps into a quiet and reserved boy named Phoenix, who sits on the side of the pool with another swim team member. Rushing to meet him, Dylan notices the book Phoenix holding, 'The Sonnets' by Shakespeare and starts to quote parts of the sonnets and begins to fall for him. The only catch is, Phoenix is nervous about getting in the water for a reason, which he fears would cause Dylan to step back. Will he? A sweet and nice short romcom.
response.title: Swim
